desc.zh-CN:
南通轨道交通是中华人民共和国江苏省南通市的城市轨道交通系统，于2022年11月10日正式开通运行。

南通轨道交通规划始于2011年，2014年8月获得国务院审批通过。规划由4条线路构成，全长170.8公里，此外还有153.2公里的市域线路。南通轨道交通一号线于2017年12月18日开工，2022年11月10日开通运营。目前的线路有已开通的1号线（南通西站 - 振兴路站）和建设中的2号线（幸福镇站 - 先锋镇站），共计59.55km。
desc.en:
Nantong Rail Transit is an urban rail transit system in Nantong City, Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China (PRC), which was officially put into operation on November 10th, 2022.

Nantong rail transit planning began in 2011 and was approved by the State Council in August 2014. The plan consists of four lines, with a total length of 170.8 kilometers, in addition to 153.2 kilometers of municipal lines. Nantong Rail Transit Line 1 started on December 18, 2017 and opened for operation on November 10, 2022. At present, there are Line 1 which has been opened (Nantong West Railway Station-Zhenxing Road Station) and Line 2 which is under construction (Xingfu Town Station-Xianfeng Town Station), with a total length of 59.55km.
https://zh.wikipedia.org/zh-cn/%E5%8D%97%E9%80%9A%E8%BD%A8%E9%81%93%E4%BA%A4%E9%80%9A
